changeSet.author: Andrey
changeSet.createProcedure:
-- ============================================= -- Author: Tatarkov -- Create date: -- Description: -- ============================================= CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[demo_ReplaceData] -- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here
AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
-- Insert statements for procedure here UPDATE [dbo].[ent_Delivery] SET [key]='Р0'+cast(id as nvarchar(100)) -- ,[date] ,[sumAll]=[sumAll]*0.7
,[grossWeight]=[grossWeight]*0.8 ,[orderDoc]='O0'+cast(order_id as nvarchar(100))
,[paymentSum]=[paymentSum]*0.7
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_DeliveryDetails] SET [sumPrice]=[sumPrice]*0.7
,[weight]=[weight]*0.8
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_Contacts] SET [contactKey]='УТ-00'+cast(id_contact as nvarchar(100)) ,[name]='Контрагент'+cast(id_contact as nvarchar(100)) ,[fullName]='Контрагент'+cast(id_contact as nvarchar(100))
,[CompanyAddress]='Адрес контрагента '+cast(id_contact as nvarchar(100)) ,[factAddress]='Адрес контрагента '+cast(id_contact as nvarchar(100)) ,[shippingAddress]='Адрес контрагента '+cast(id_contact as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_Employe] SET [Name] = 'Сотрудник'+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_FirstLevels] SET [Name] = 'Руководитель '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100)), [key] = 'Ключ'+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_Goods] SET [Name] = case when [isGroup]=1 then 'Группа товаров ' else 'Товар ' end+ cast([id_good] as nvarchar(100)), [fullName] = case when [isGroup]=1 then 'Группа товаров ' else 'Товар ' end+ cast([id_good] as nvarchar(100)), [goodKey] = 'Ключ'+ cast([id_good] as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_GoodsType] SET [Name] = 'Тип продукции '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_GroupNMK] SET [Name] = 'Группа НМК '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_KindPacking] SET [Name] = 'Упаковка '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_MainManagers] SET [Name] = 'Менеджер '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_Payment] SET [payment_key] = 'P '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100)), amount=amount*0.7
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_PaymentDetails] SET amount=amount*0.7
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_PaymentOrder] SET [key] = 'PO '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100)), [sum]=[sum]*0.7
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_PaymentOrderDetails] SET [amount]=[amount]*0.7
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_PaymentOrderOutcome] SET [key] = 'POO '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100)), [sum]=[sum]*0.7
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_PaymentOrderOutcomeDetails] SET amount=amount*0.7
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_Plan] SET [sum]=[sum]*0.7 ,[weight]=[weight]*0.8
,[profit]=[profit]*0.7
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_PriceGoods] SET [key] = 'PT '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_PriceGoodsDetails] SET [price] = [price]*0.7
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_PriceType] SET name = 'PT '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_ProfitManagers] SET name = 'Основной менеджер '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_Regions] SET [key] = 'Ключ '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100)), name = 'Регион '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_ReturnGoods] SET [key] = 'Ключ '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100)), [sumAll]=[sumAll]*0.7 ,[grossWeight]=[grossWeight]*0.8
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_ReturnGoodsDeiliveries] SET
[sum]=[sum]*0.7
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_ReturnGoodsDetails] SET
[sumPrice]=[sumPrice]*0.7 ,[weight]=[weight]*0.8
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_SalesPlans] SET
[plan]=[plan]*0.7
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_Stock] SET
name = 'Склад '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_SubgroupNMK] SET
name = 'Подгруппа НМК '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_CauseReturn] SET
name = 'Причина '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_BKG] SET
name = 'БКГ '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_Brends] SET
name = 'Бренд '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100)), [key] = 'Бренд '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_Geography] SET
[geographyValue] = 'География '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[ent_Supervizer] SET
name = 'Супервайзер '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100)), UserName = 'Супервайзер '+ cast(id as nvarchar(100))
UPDATE [dbo].[rep_SumWeightByDay] SET
[planSum]=[planSum]*0.7 ,[Sum]=[Sum]*0.7 ,[weight]=[weight]*0.8
DELETE FROM [dbo].[tst_CalculateData]
delete from [tst_CalculateDataByContacts]
delete from [tst_DebitoreByContacts] delete from [tst_PastDueAccountsByContacts] END
